reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and accentuates curves, with soft, beautiful velvet material that hugs the waistline.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: LOVE this dress. It is comfortable and flattering. I have received so many compliments when wearing it. The material has a bit of stretch, so it still fits nicely as my weight has fluctuated. The material is opaque and nicely heavy, but I do not overheat in it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and so pretty!
items.body: It’s not quite as green as it appears in the photo but I still really loved it! It’s more of a brownish green but it can look slightly different in different lighting. I wore this to a cold winter wedding and I definitely appreciated finding a dress with long sleeves! The slight ripples of the fabric on the front make it really flattering! The fabric, color, and the gathering of the fabric made my post holiday belly seem slimmer which I appreciated! I had this packed tightly in a carry on bag and it had very limited wrinkles when I unpacked it which then shook out immediately. Flattering cut and length! Cute with strappy heals as well as tights and dressy boots! If you want a fitted, flattering, earth toned dress, this is perfect! Read more
items.author: Emma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Great dress. The fit, look, and style looks great! The material is on ruff thicker side. Thec dress has stretch to it . Read more
items.author: lissette

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Flattering
items.body: Super cute, comfy, and made with good material. I’m 5’3” and 148 lbs and got a size small — it fit like a glove and even hid my stomach area while hugging all the right places. The only downside is that when I sat down, the slit went up pretty high, and I had to keep pulling it closed. Read more
items.author: Ya Ya

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Quality and Fit
items.body: This dress is absolutely not worth the price. Fabric is thin and looks cheap. I ordered my normal size and the fit was off...skin tight in the hips and thighs and weirdly big on top. The v neck is very wide and just doesn't sit right. Unfortunately, the dress was returned. Read more
items.author: cghudson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress! Hand steam - worth it
items.body: This dress fits great and looks fantastic! It’s comfortable and has a little stretch. I went with amazon’s suggested size for my profile. Fits perfectly. Great for cold weather. Came vacuum packed, so very wrinkled. Hand steaming worked great. (Ice cubes in the dryer did not work) Read more
items.author: Cac

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Is cute
items.body: The dress is nice, although the fit is a bit off and it had a bad smell. The quality is not bad, but it has a little stretch. The fabric is soft and has a moderate thickness. Read more
items.author: COLETTE ROGERS-WHYTE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great
items.body: Slinky fit. Sexy. True to size. Emerald green.lovely xmas dress. Read more
items.author: Mel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Army Green, Wine Red, Pink, Blue, Purple, Peacock Blue, Royal Blue, Mauve, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
